product.title: Crushed Velvet Champagne Curtain
product.description: An affordable alternative to velvet, their velour fabrics bring elegance and rich texture to your home. Produced in yorkshire, we've included soft shades in their collection which tie in with any theme. A soft grey brown shade, champagne curtains create a soft look whilst bring warm earth tones to your home. Product id: db-cur0995 fabric colour: champagne material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes crushed velvet champagne curtain in brown.

relproducts.title: Velvet Royal Blue Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft roman blind in royal blue, introduces a deep dark blue to your home.

relproducts.title: Malta Charcoal Curtain
relproducts.description: Malta is one of their most popular fabric collections. Malta charcoal is a dark, statement grey shade. An elegant hue that will work well with modern grey interiors. Grey is a stylish choice, and a trend that's not looking to go anywhere just yet. This fabric is beautiful for living rooms, dining rooms or bedrooms. Their made to measure curtains are all handmade within the uk and will provide a touch of luxury to your interior styling.
